name: Vessel Blue
description:
YOU CANNOT MOVE in this Survival-Horror-Puzzle-Game! While solving puzzles with your computer, you have to defend yourself against a walking pumpkin monster. Examine objects, read documents and interact with your computer.

INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT


Solve text-based puzzles using your computer. Explore the mysterious software of the device by reading documents, encrypting files and entering codes into databases.

SOLVE PUZZLES WITH YOUR COMPUTER


Examine items that are located on your desk to help you proceed through the game. Read documents to find even more clues. But be aware: while you're trying to solve the mysteries, you're hunted by an evil walking pumpkin monster.

DEFEND YOURSELF, YOU CANNOT MOVE


You CANNOT MOVE in this game! You're glued to your chair, and have to constantly watch your back to scare the pumpkin man away while solving the puzzles.
